entry.content:
Hi,

I build and test the accessibility of websites.

I became somewhat obsessed with semantic HTML, and the joy of CSS when in 2003 I read Designing with Web Standards by Jeffrey Zeldman. Hungry for more I moved on to Web Standards Solutions by Dan Cederholm in 2004, and CSS: The Definitive Guide by Eric Meyer. I was hookedâ€¦

I often listen to web pages, and usually hate the br tag.

Alan Bristow
